Class AnalyticService

java.lang.Object
com.bbbb.data.Analytics.AnalyticService
public class AnalyticService extends Object
Service class for handling Analytics related database operations.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    AnalyticService(Database database)
    Constructs an AnalyticService with a database connection.

  • Constructor Details

    • AnalyticService

      public AnalyticService(Database database)
      Constructs an AnalyticService with a database connection.
      Parameters:
      database - The database connection to be used by this service.

  • Method Details

    • getTopSellingProducts

      public List<TopSellingProduct> getTopSellingProducts(int limit)
      Retrieves a list of the top-selling products, limited by the specified number.
      Parameters:
      limit - The maximum number of top-selling products to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A list of TopSellingProduct objects, each containing the product name and total sold quantity.

    • getSalesOverDays

      public List<javafx.util.Pair<LocalDateTime,BigDecimal>> getSalesOverDays(LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end)
      Retrieves sales data aggregated by day within a specified date range.
      Parameters:
      start - The start date of the range.
      end - The end date of the range.
      Returns:
      A list of pairs, each containing a day and the corresponding total sales for that day.

    • getSalesDuringDay

      public List<javafx.util.Pair<LocalDateTime,BigDecimal>> getSalesDuringDay(LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end)
      Retrieves sales data during a specified day, grouped by hour.
      Parameters:
      start - The start date and time.
      end - The end date and time.
      Returns:
      A List<Pair<LocalDateTime, BigDecimal>> containing sales data grouped by hour.

    • getSalesOverWeeks

      public List<javafx.util.Pair<LocalDateTime,BigDecimal>> getSalesOverWeeks(LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end)
      Retrieves sales data aggregated by week within a specified date range.
      Parameters:
      start - The start date of the range.
      end - The end date of the range.
      Returns:
      A list of pairs, each containing a week and the corresponding total sales for that week.

    • getSalesOverMonths

      public List<javafx.util.Pair<LocalDateTime,BigDecimal>> getSalesOverMonths(LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end)
      Retrieves the sales data over a specified date range, grouped by month.
      Parameters:
      start - the start date
      end - the end date
      Returns:
      a List<Pair<LocalDateTime, BigDecimal>> containing the sales data over months; if an error occurs, a null list is returned

    • getIngredientUsageOverTime

      public List<javafx.util.Pair<LocalDateTime,BigDecimal>> getIngredientUsageOverTime(LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end, String interval, int ingredientId)
      Retrieves the ingredient usage over a specified time range, grouped by a given interval.
      Parameters:
      start - The starting interval for which the ingredient usage will be calculated from
      end - The ending interval for which the ingredient usage will be calculated from
      ingredientId - The ingredient for which to calculate the usage of
      Returns:
      A List of LocalDateTime and BigDecimal Pairs that corresponds to a date and usage

    • getTotals

      public DailyTotal getTotals()
      Retrieves the daily totals from the daily summary.
      Returns:
      a DailyTotal object populated with the totals from the daily summary

    • getItemSales

      public Map<Integer,Integer> getItemSales()
      Retrieves the item sales for the day.
      Returns:
      a map from each itemId to the amount of times it has been sold in the day

    • getIngredientUsage

      public Map<Integer,BigDecimal> getIngredientUsage()
      Retrieves the ingredient usage for the day.
      Returns:
      a map from each ingredientId to its usage for the day

    • resetTotals

      public void resetTotals()
      Resets totals to 0
